name: Smart! Prototype
description:
Smart! is a little prototype made by me by myself. It's a little Puzzle Game where you have to escape from a factory where you work.

Its original intent was to serve as a Puzzle Editor Tool for my Final Work for my Videogames College Degree, but the circumstances made me change my opinion and start again with another project, but with the same porpouse as the first one.

Website: https://victorsegurablanco.com Github: https://github.com/VictorSegura99 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/victorsegurablanco/
